description: Detects an executable in the Windows folder accessing suspicious domains
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Microsoft Binary Suspicious Communication Endpoint
query: (((process.executable.text:("C\:\\PerfLogs*" OR "C\:\\Temp\\*" OR "C\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\*")) OR (process.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Temp\\*")) AND (winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true" AND destination.domain:(*.ghostbin.co OR *.githubusercontent.com OR *.hastebin.com OR *.paste.ee OR *.pastebin.com OR *anonfiles.com OR *cdn.discordapp.com OR *ddns.net OR *dl.dropboxusercontent.com OR *mediafire.com OR *mega.nz OR *paste.ee OR *pastebin.pl OR *pastetext.net OR *privatlab.com OR *privatlab.net OR *send.exploit.in OR *sendspace.com OR *transfer.sh OR *ufile.io)))
